title: Echoneo Artwork Prompt Schema v1
description: JSON schema for defining the prompt instructions for a single AI-generated artwork, clearly separating its core concept from its visual style and technique.

$type.description: The type and version of this prompt schema.

artworkTitle.description: The intended title for this specific artwork.

conceptDefinition.description: PART 1: Defines WHAT the artwork is about - its core ideas, subjects, narrative, and feeling.

origin.description: Name or description of where the core concept idea comes from (e.g., 'Prehistoric Art', 'Myth of Icarus', 'Personal Dream').

coreThemes.description: List the main conceptual ideas or themes (e.g., 'Loneliness', 'Nature's Power', 'Technological Anxiety', 'Celebration').

keySubjects.description: List the main elements or figures to be depicted (e.g., 'Solitary figure', 'Stormy sea', 'Glowing circuits', 'Dancing couple').

narrativeFocus.description: Describe the scene, action, or story the artwork should convey.

desiredEmotion.description: The primary emotional tone the artwork should evoke (e.g., 'Melancholy', 'Awe', 'Excitement', 'Peace').

symbolismHints.description: (Optional) Suggest symbols or visual metaphors to include related to the concept.

references.description: Any other reference note (e.g., 'Study for Series X', 'Based on poem Y').

styleDefinition.description: PART 2: Defines HOW the artwork should look - its visual style, techniques, medium, colors, and composition approach.

origin.description: Name or description of where the core concept idea comes from (e.g., 'Prehistoric Art', 'Myth of Icarus', 'Personal Dream').

visualCharacteristics.description: List key visual descriptors of the desired style (e.g., 'Painterly brushstrokes', 'Clean vector lines', 'Gritty realism', 'Abstract geometric shapes', 'Lush ornamentation').

techniques.description: List specific artistic techniques to emulate (e.g., 'Impasto', 'Cross-hatching', 'Flat color blocking', 'Photobashing elements', 'Glazing').

mediumSimulation.description: Specify the art medium the AI should simulate (e.g., 'Oil painting', 'Watercolor sketch', 'Charcoal drawing', 'Digital illustration', 'Clay sculpture').

description.description: Describe the overall color approach (e.g., 'Warm earth tones', 'Monochromatic blue scale', 'High-contrast neon', 'Pastel and muted').

keyColors.description: (Optional) Suggest specific dominant or accent colors.

textureEmphasis.description: Describe the desired surface texture feel (e.g., 'Rough canvas texture', 'Smooth metallic sheen', 'Soft fabric feel', 'Aged paper').

compositionStyle.description: Describe the overall compositional approach (e.g., 'Rule of thirds', 'Symmetrical balance', 'Dynamic diagonal lines', 'Central focus', 'Minimalist').

references.description: Any other reference note (e.g., 'Study for Series X', 'Based on poem Y').

aiDirectives.description: (Recommended) Specific fine-tuning instructions for the AI generator.

width.description: The width of the image to generate.

height.description: The height of the image to generate.

aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio of the image to generate ex: 4:3, 1:1.

emphasize.description: List elements the AI should prioritize or enhance.

avoid.description: List elements the AI should exclude or minimize.

styleStrength.description: (Optional Hint) Suggests how strongly to adhere to the style definition (e.g., 0.8 for strong style adherence).

negativePromptHints.description: Keywords often useful in a negative prompt (e.g., 'ugly', 'deformed', 'text', 'watermark', 'low quality').
